managedOrganizationId.description: PixieBrix organization ID the extension should link to

enforceAuthentication.description: Enforce PixieBrix authentication on specified URLs

disableLoginTab.description: Disable opening a login tab on install and heartbeat

ssoUrl.description: URL to perform single sign-on, including scheme

controlRoomUrl.description: Automation Anywhere Control Room URL, including scheme

campaignIds.description: Campaign IDs the extension is associated with

deploymentKey.description: Shared deployment key for receiving deployments without user-authentication

disableBrowserWarning.description: Disable the browser warning for non-Chrome browsers, e.g., Microsoft Edge

showSidebarLogo.description: Controls the visibility the PixieBrix sidebar logo. Overrides the team theme, if one exists.
